description: OneForm automates the Fil+ allocator intake process through verified social accounts and structured KYB forms, reducing reviewer workload while improving transparency and auditability. Since Nov 2024, it has launched end-to-end workflows, reviewer dashboards, and analytics that enable more SPs to apply transparently under KYB-first governance rules.
additional_impact:
Beyond governance automation, OneForm contributes to the sustainability and auditability of the Fil+ program:
	•	Establishes an interoperable form and social verification framework that can be reused by other governance tools.
	•	Provides an early foundation for community co-review systems, where allocators, SPs, and volunteers can stake and co-sign transparently.
	•	Promotes “social trust” as a governance primitive within Filecoin.
end_user:
The primary beneficiaries are Filecoin Plus Allocators, reviewers, and Storage Providers (SPs) applying for DataCap.
	•	For Allocators and reviewers, OneForm reduces manual workload through automated KYB verification, structured submissions, and a unified dashboard for intake management.
	•	For SPs, it simplifies and standardizes the application process, enabling transparent submission and status tracking.
	•	For the broader governance community, it increases participation by making allocator workflows auditable and easier to understand.
testimonials:
OneForm has received many positive testimonials from active Allocators, reviewers, and SP teams in the Fil+ ecosystem.
https://github.com/WorldPeace1121/one-form-social-cap
governance_accessibility_impact:
OneForm lowers the barrier to participate in Fil+ governance by transforming manual, opaque allocator processes into transparent, standardized workflows.
	•	Any community member can view and understand application logic through clear dashboards and visual forms.
	•	Reviewers can now make decisions based on verifiable KYB data rather than private communication.
	•	This transparency encourages new allocators and reviewers to join, aligning governance participation with measurable on-chain actions.
